```py
# Import Qiskit
import qiskit
# Set versions variable to the current Qiskit versions
versions=qiskit.__qiskit_version__
# Print the version number for the Qiskit components
print("Qiskit components and versions:")
print("===============================")

for i in versions:
    print (i, versions[i]) 
```
